name: df-full
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cful, cmpo(s0, s1, ccat, ccat, copab(s2, s3, wa(wbr(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfunc, cv(s1)), cv(s3)), wral(s4, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s5, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(crn(co(cv(s4), cv(s3), cv(s5))), co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4)), cfv(chom, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s5))))))))))
comment: Function returning all the full functors from a category ` C ` to a category ` D ` . A full functor is a functor in which all the morphism maps ` G ( X , Y ) ` between objects ` X , Y e. C ` are surjections. Definition 3.27(3) in [Adamek] p. 34. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
